overview_metadata.overview_subtitle: Reflections of Figures on the Coordinate Plane
overview_metadata.overview_description: In this lesson, students use patty paper to explore reflections of various figures on a coordinate plane. They then generalize the effects that reflecting a figure has on its coordinates. Students verify that two figures are congruent by describing a sequence of reflections and translations that map one figure onto another.

overview_item_data_items: I can reflect geometric figures on the coordinate plane.
I can use coordinates to describe the effect of reflecting a two-dimensional figure.
A reflection is a transformation that flips a figure across a reflection line.
A reflection line acts as a mirror such that corresponding points are the same distance from the mirror.
When you reflect a geometric figure across the y-axis, the x-values of the ordered pairs of the pre-image become opposites and the y-values remain the same.
When you reflect a geometric figure across the x-axis, the y-values of the ordered pairs of the pre-image become opposites and the x-values remain the same.

A point with the coordinates <math><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></math>, when reflected across the x-axis, has new coordinates <math><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></math>. A point with the coordinates <math><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></math>, when reflected across the y-axis, has new coordinates <math><mo>(</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></math>.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students use informal language about reflections.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Modeling Reflections on the Coordinate Plane
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students explore and make conjectures about how a reflection affects the coordinate of the pre-image.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Reflecting Any Points on the Coordinate Plane
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students perform reflections of a single point and record the coordiantes of the reflected points.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Verifying Congruence Using Reflections and Translations
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students demonstrate that two figures are congruent when the same sequence of reflections and translations maps one figure onto the other.
Students generalize how a reflection affects an ordered pair (x, y).
